Package it.polimi.ingsw.Model.JSON

Class JSONReader

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.Model.JSON.JSONReader
public class JSONReader
extends java.lang.Object
JSONReader Class contains all the methods needed to read a .json file whenever it is necessary.

  • Constructor Details

    • JSONReader

      public JSONReader()

  • Method Details

    • ReadDevelopmentCards

      public static DevelopmentCard[] ReadDevelopmentCards()
      "ReadDevelopmentCards" method reads a .json file containing all information about each card and returns an array of DevelopmentCard objects containing every single development card. A Try and Catch statement is needed because there could be errors while reading and/or parsing the file.

    • ReadVaticanReportSection

      public static VaticanReportSection[] ReadVaticanReportSection()
      Json Reader for the vatican report section

    • ReadFaithCells

      public static FaithCell[] ReadFaithCells()
      Json Reader for faith cells

      Returns:

    • convertCardsInDeck

      public static java.lang.Integer[] convertCardsInDeck()
      This method reads from the JSON file an array of cardsInDeck that will be set in the game
      Returns:
      an array of cardsInDeck

    • convertMarketPersistence

      public static Market convertMarketPersistence()
      This method reads the market from the JSON file
      Returns:
      a new market with the marbles in the same position of the file

    • convertMarble

      public static Marble convertMarble​(java.lang.String marble)
      Method to convert the String of marble in to a Maeble
      Parameters:
      marble - a String that represents the Marble
      Returns:

    • convertLeaderCardPersistence

      public static java.util.ArrayList<LeaderCard> convertLeaderCardPersistence()
      This method converts the Leader Cards read from the json file
      Returns:
      an ArrayList of the LeaderCards of every player
